resources.string: Share your vote on Facebook or Twitter

Adele Laurie Blue Adkins (Tottenham, England, May 5, 1988), known simply as Adele, is a British singer and songwriter. From a very young age he showed his interest in music and in 2006 he graduated from the BRIT School of Performing Arts and Technology, where he signed a contract with XL Recordings, after being discovered by demos that a friend published on MySpace.

JHONNY RIVERA. (Jhon Jairo Rivera Valencia) He was born in Pereira-Risaralda on February 23rd, most of his life passed in the village of PÃ©rez, jurisdiction of the district of Arabia - Pereira, a region he remembers with a lot of affection, since there in the field work Next to his father he made friends that will last in his heart. His humble family is made up of his parents.

Robyn Rihanna Fenty (Bridgetown, February 20, 1988), known simply as Rihanna, is a singer, actress and fashion designer Barbadian. He began his career in 2003 when he auditioned for music producer Evan Rogers. At the age of sixteen, Rogers, decided to take her to the United States to record models. He later auditioned for Jay-Z and signed a six-album contract with Def Jam Recordings.
